Then , quality control OECs do immunohistochemical stain positive GFAP , S100 , P75 . Finally , investigator transplant OECs ( 2 8 X 10´6 cell saline ) peri-infarcted area brain .
DOC.detailed_description: ( 1 ) Recruited patient receive endoscopic surgery pick olfactory mucosa 1 2 month transplantation . The OECs culture expanded rule GTP . Then , quality control OECs do immunohistochemical stain positive GFAP , S100 , P75 . Finally , investigator transplant OECs ( 2 8 X 10´6 cell saline ) peri-infarcted area brain . ( 2 ) Combination traditional drug therapy ( use anti-thrombosis reagent anti-platelet aggregation reagent ) . ( 3 ) NIH-stroke scale ( NIHSS ) , European stroke scale ( ESS ) , European stroke motor subscale ( EMS ) , Barthel Index ( BI ) MMSE perform patient evaluate therapeutic effect primary end point . ( 4 ) In addition , MRI ( DTI ) & TMS ( MEP ) also check recruitment patient secondary end point .
DOC.criteria: Aged 3570 year old Chronic Stroke Adult Patients , With Stroke History More Than 6 Months , Less Than 60 Months , With Stable Hemiplegia Condition , NIHSS Score Is Between 5~15 . Patients Aged Less Than 35 More Than 70 , Hemorrhage Stroke MRI Show The Occlusion Is Not In The Middle Cerebral Artery Territory , NIHSS Is Not In The Range 5~15 , Pregnant Women , Impaired Liver Function , Abnormal Blood Coagulation , AIDS Carrier , Tumors , Other Special Conditions , etc .
